title: Call WILCO home this Sept, convenient location at the edge of Ktown
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1111 - 1156 Sq.
WILCO is a new way of living in an old part of town.
Our curated living spaces are meticulously designed to spark creativity, enhance engagement, and embody life as art.
We inspire our residents to Connect, Co-create, and Collaborate.

Floor-to-ceiling windows*, Studio, one and two bedroom apartments, Wood plank style flooring on levels 4 through 7, Private patios and balconies*, Open plan designs with high ceilings, Polished concrete floors on levels 2 and 3, Upgraded stainless steel GE appliances, Spacious closets and storage, Generous kitchen layouts with quartz counters and matte cabinetry, Soaking tubs with custom tile surrounds, Vented washers & dryers in all units

Lobby level community lounge & coffee bar, Amazon package management system, Podcast and music practice room with piano, Bike storage with repair station, Poolside club lounge with chef's kitchen, Gated onsite parking, Programmed community events, including: yoga classes, cooking demonstrations, music performances and revolving artist exhibitions throughout the year, 24-hour controlled access, Co-working space with conference room, Dedicated yoga and meditation studio, Rooftop sky garden with BBQ grills and unobstructed views of Downtown/Hollywood, Resort-style pool and spa, EV charging stations, Wi-Fi throughout all common areas, State-of-the-art fitness facility with cardio and strength training equipment, Pet friendly community
